Text: For the love of God, we need seeds.

Seriously.  If any of you ever have any distrust in the powers that be, you really need to see this.  There needs to be change!  Watch this movie any way you can and share it with all the ones you care for.  Trust me.

This is definitely a powerful movie. No matter what opinion you hold beforehand, you will come out seeing reality differently.

This movie is simply amazing. No matter what opinion you have on any of the parts of this film.... WATCH THEM!!! Start opening your mind and ask questions, digg deeper ;), THINK, comment, discuss, spread it. There's no denying that some of the topics addressed in this film are incendiary. Step aside Micheal Moore...
